name: CapturedEnemy
_source: speak;Villager Man 5;We captured this bandit as he was trying to escape.{w}{br}Now he'll face justice!
speak;Mercenary1;Please, I haven't hurt anyone!{w}{br}I was forced to join!
speak;Villager Man 5;Hah, sure! That's what they all say!{w}{br}Alright boys, fetch the rope!{w}{br}This bastard'll hang!
speak;Simon;Have any of you taken a life before?
speak;Simon;He is not worthy of being your first.{w}{br}Spare him, and yourselves.
speak;Villager Man 5;He's a bandit!{w} He'll return with even more raiders!
speak;Simon;I think he knows that he won't be so lucky next time.
speak;Mercenary1;I could d-defend your village.{w}{br}For free.
speak;Villager Man 5;Like we'd trust you to do that!
speak;Simon;If tries to betray you, then do what you'd like.{w}{br}But, it may be wise to give him a chance.
speak;Villager Man 5;Try anything funny and I'll be happy to cut ya down.

speak;Simon;It would be wrong for me to deny them justice.{w}{br}Who knows how much these villagers have been through.{w}{br}Besides, making an example of him might deter future attacks.;;;thought_bubble
